title: How to Get 90 People on Virtual Villagers a New Home(the Fast Way)

steps.headline: Learn that when you start the game, you have a certain amount of villagers: 7 (easy), 6 (normal), and 5 (hard).
steps.description: Start by having one person build the hut, one person forage, and the rest research.

steps.headline: Click on the button that takes you out of the game and minimize it.
steps.description: The game goes with your computer clock. Reset your game clock up to 2 hours.

steps.headline: See if you have the amount of tech points to buy farming.
steps.description: If you do buy it, but not anything else. If not, make sure you have at least 300 food and people are foraging, then go up another 2 hours.

steps.headline: Make sure you open the well by putting a builder on the covered well.
steps.description: Have that builder clear the beach.

steps.headline: Go up 2 hours at a time while checking on your villagers.
Have your builder start on the lagoon.
Start following the milestones and your on your way to a larger population!

text: Learn that when you start the game, you have a certain amount of villagers: 7 (easy), 6 (normal), and 5 (hard). Start by having one person build the hut, one person forage, and the rest research. Click on the button that takes you out of the game and minimize it. The game goes with your computer clock. Reset your game clock up to 2 hours. See if you have the amount of tech points to buy farming. If you do buy it, but not anything else. If not, make sure you have at least 300 food and people are foraging, then go up another 2 hours. Make sure you open the well by putting a builder on the covered well. Have that builder clear the beach. Go up 2 hours at a time while checking on your villagers. This will save 82500 tech points. Buy farming and building.  Have your builder start on the lagoon.  Have the villagers have children.  Start following the milestones and your on your way to a larger population!
